about_the_game:
Embark on an exciting adventure in the world of roadside diners. In this game, you become the owner of a small roadside diner and must develop it to attract more customers and become a successful entrepreneur. You will be renovating and improving your establishment, creating a unique menu, enticing travelers to your side of the road, and developing strategies to expand your business. Road Dinner Simulator - Renovate, Upgrade, Expand - offers you the opportunity to immerse yourself in the captivating world of entrepreneurship and gastronomy, where your managerial skills and culinary artistry will determine your success.

Cafe Management on the Road: You start with a small, cozy cafe and work on its development and improvement. Decide what menu to offer to customers and how to decorate your cafe to attract more visitors.

Cooking a Variety of Dishes: Your main task is to prepare a variety of dishes to satisfy the tastes of different customers. From traditional burgers to exquisite desserts, you have plenty of recipes and ingredients to experiment with.

Development and Upgrades: Earn money and experience to upgrade your cafe. Upgrade equipment, hire professional chefs, and create a unique menu to attract more customers.

Time Management: The tables in your cafe are always filled with guests, so you'll need to be a master of time management. Prepare orders quickly and accurately to keep customers happy.

Unique Recipes and Ingredients: Explore different recipes and find unique ingredients to give your cafe a special charm. Experiment and create amazing combinations that will be the hallmark of your cafe and attract visitors from around the world.

Various Situations: The game will offer a variety of tasks, challenges, and situations that will help you earn additional resources and improve the reputation of your cafe. By completing tasks, you can expand your business, increase your status, and access materials to enhance your establishment.

name: Road Dinner SImulator-Renovate,Upgrade,Expand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Road Dinner SImulator is an exciting cafe management simulation game where you'll become the owner and head chef of a small but cozy cafe on the edge of a picturesque highway. This game allows you to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of culinary adventures and business.
